text: Move, Inc., headquartered in Santa Clara, California, is a leading real estate listing company. Founded in 1993 as InfoTouch Corporation in Delaware, Move is now based in Santa Clara and operates Move.com and Realtor.com. The company owns ListHub, a platform for listing syndication and reporting. Additionally, Move operates Avail (acquired in 2020), Doorsteps.com (acquired in 2013), Moving.com, Relocation.com, and UpNest (acquired in 2022). Tracey Fellows served as acting CEO of Move and Realtor.com in 2019, followed by David Doctorow taking on the role of CEO in 2020. In 2022, Bryan Ellis assumed the position of chief revenue officer, while Arthur Chapin became the chief growth officer. == References == Category:Companies based in California
title: Move (company)
